card.name: Aqua Hulcus
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Spiral Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Mist Rias, Sonic Guardian
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Locomotiver
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cocco Lupia
card.text: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. ''(Dragonoids don't count.)'' They can't cost less than 2.

card.name: Kooc Pollon
card.text: ■ This creature can't be attacked.

card.name: Volcano Charger
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less. ■ Charger

card.name: Hearty Cap'n Polligon
card.text: ■ End Step

card.name: Lucky Ball
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has 3 or fewer shields, draw up to 2 cards.

card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Jenny, the Dismantling Puppet
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

card.name: Evolution Totem
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an evolution creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ This creature gets +3000 power for each evolution creature in the battle zone.

card.name: Death March, Reaper Puppeteer
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Graveyard evolution—Choose a darkness creature in your graveyard and put this card into the battle zone on top of that creature. ■ Whenever this creature battles, your opponent's creature gets -4000 power until the end of the battle. ''(A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)''

card.name: Aqua Super Emeral
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Kuragen
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an evolution creature from it and show it to your opponent. Then shuffle your deck and put the chosen card on top of your deck.

card.name: Ida, the Great Enigma
card.text: ■ Mana Evolution ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Aqua Evoluter
card.text: ■ Your water evolution creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Yata Izuna, Eight-Headed Parasite
card.text: ■ At the Step#Step 2 (Draw)

card.name: Blazing Tiger, Crimson Lord
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less.

card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: DNA Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: HEIKE Double Cross, Gaga Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they Unchoosable

card.name: Princess Cub, the Crusher
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less into their owners' mana zone.

card.name: Zabi Barrel, Western Doll
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger

card.name: Moel, Love Sniper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature or a creature that costs 7 or more into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

card.name: Truename Baulion
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return up to 2 spells from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Codename Valkyrie Ragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Dragon from your deck, show that Dragon to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Onikirimaru
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are fire or colorless, this creature gets +3000 power and has "speed attacker".

card.name: Honenbe, Skeletal Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ragnarok, the Clock
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

card.name: Mypad, Start Dash
card.text: ■ Each turn, you may have the first water creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Kerasas, Start Dash
card.text: ■ Each turn, you may have the first nature creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Falcon Bomber, Rocket Dash
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Berserk, Sanctuary Odin
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put any number of cards from your graveyard into your mana zone. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Valhait, Lucky Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. From among them, add one to your shields face down, and put the other into your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Cocco Docco
card.text: ■ Your Command Dragons may cost up to 3 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ When you put a Command Dragon into the battle zone, destroy this creature.

card.name: Coccolua, Holy Dragon Wings
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Your Command Dragons may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Meteor Charger
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". ■ Charger

card.name: Eggsaura, Nourishing Egg
card.text: ■ Whenever you put a creature that has power 5000 or more into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Tenshukaku, Dragon King Keep
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, you may show a fire creature to your opponent and destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has that creatures power or less. ■ Mana Arms ■ Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Ganaldonal, Wrath Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all tapped creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Bakuadorgan, Passion Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Dragon, put it into your hand. If it's not a Dragon, put it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Koltiolu, Scale Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your Dragons in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Bg Newton Custom Panzer, Dragment Symbol
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent draws one or more cards, you may draw the same number of cards. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Denebumongo, Excess Wings
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. Then you may put a light creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Cocco Gett, Dragment Lore
card.text: ■ Mana Arms 3: If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, your Command Dragons may each cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Trois Charger
card.text: ■ You may put a light creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone. ■ Charger

card.name: Box, Invader
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ This creature can't be blocked.

card.name: Talbot, Sonic
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ This creature attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Ajarashi, Invader
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger

card.name: Dice Dice, Super Eureka
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. ■ Invasion ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 4 cards. Then, your opponent chooses 2 cards from your hand at random and puts them on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Talu, Magic Ball
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can’t attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Gogo Jigocchi
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Dragon from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
